summary: Provides utilities to evaluate how fully AWS CloudFormation resources are implemented in the Moto mock library. It includes a checklist mechanism that determines whether a resource supports creation, deletion, and updating, compares expected and missing attributes, and supplies helpers for status evaluation, formatting, and generating documentation output.
business_intent: Enable developers and maintainers to measure, document, and improve the coverage of CloudFormation resource implementations within Moto, facilitating gap identification and better mock support for testing.
